summary: Completed testing of SDC Process Flow feature. All 9 requested features verified working correctly. Backend API tests: 19/19 passed. Frontend UI tests: All process flow features working as expected.
passed_tests: 1. GET /api/sdcs/{id}/process-status returns process data with stages and deliverables - PASSED
4. SDC Detail page shows 'Process Flow' tab as default - PASSED
5. Process stages show in sequential order with progress bars - PASSED

7. Deliverables section shows 4 items with dropdown (Pending/Completed/Not Required) - PASSED
8. 'Mark Complete' button updates stage to 100% - PASSED
9. Progress percentage updates correctly when stage is updated - PASSED
critical_code_review_comments: Process status endpoint correctly initializes data on first access
Stage dependency tracking works correctly - stages unlock when previous stage starts
Auto-status update works when completed count reaches target
Deliverable status options correctly include Pending/Completed/Not Required
Frontend correctly shows locked indicator (ðŸ”’) for stages that cannot start yet
seed_data_creation: None - used existing SDC (sdc_jaipur) with target_students: 60
context_for_next_testing_agent: Process Flow feature is fully implemented and working. The process-status endpoint returns 5 sequential stages (Mobilization â†’ Training â†’ OJT â†’ Assessment â†’ Placement) and 4 deliverables (Dress Distribution, Study Material, ID Card, Tool Kit). Stages have dependency tracking - a stage can only start when the previous stage is in_progress or completed. Deliverables have 3 status options: pending, completed, not_required.
